url

 22 Feb 2009

So today I learned me some Sinatra after seeing drnic’s tweet about a url generator for the mocra.com site. I thought it couldn’t be that hard and it wasn’t.

What I came up with was “url” (pronounced like “earl”). You can host this on your site and provide people with urls that contain your site’s name. Enjoy.

This app is hosted at http://u.mocra.com now too, providing tinier URLs (by ~2 characters) than other services (only because we only have 17 URLs)!
